Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute at 43rd/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, Pershing, King Drive, 43rd and Cottage Grove due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Cottage Grove, Pershing, King Drive, 43rd and Cottage Grove due to, street blockage.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Hyde Park, 55th, Lake Park, Stony Island and 57th due to, street blockage near 55th/Hyde Park.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at 79th
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 79th due to a door problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at 79th due to a door problem on a train. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

#55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 55th, Hyde Park, 53rd, Lake Park and 55th due to, street blockage near 55th/Hyde Park.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #24 Wentworth Temporary Southbound Reroute near 87th/Holland
ShortDescription: SB 24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via Vincennes and 87th due to, street blockage near 87th/Holland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound 24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted via Vincennes and 87th due to, street blockage near 87th/Holland.

Northbound buses are not affected.
